Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Punctuality \Punc`tu*al"i*ty\, n. [Cf. F. ponctualit['e].] The quality or state of being punctual; especially, adherence to the exact time of an engagement; exactness. [1913 Webster]
punctuality n : the quality or habit of adhering to an appointed time [syn: {promptness}] [ant: {tardiness}]
